column1: The first encyclopedic illustrated guide to the world of [[Middle-earth
column2: Middle Earth]] [sic] and the [[Undying Lands]], this book brings together every important aspect of [[J.R.R. Tolkien
column3: Tolkien]]'s vast cosmology. More than five hundred alphabetical entries cover five major subject areas: history, geography, sociology, natural history and biography.

column1: The maps, genealogies and time-charts, together with the illustrations of characters, places and events, reveal to the reader the full dramatic sweep and splendor of Tolkien's world.
